notes:
### This is the second release of KJV_Search_Tools.

This release was hosted on [kjv-search-tools.online](url) during its lifespan.

You can find the docker image for v0.2.0 here:
https://hub.docker.com/repository/docker/theodorcrosswell/kjv-similarity-map/general

You can pull the docker image for v0.2.0 by running:

```bash
docker pull theodorcrosswell/kjv-similarity-map:v0.2.0
```

## Changelog

New Features:

- Fullscreen mode
- Map color selector
- Pan to coordinate
- Project description and instructions
- Links to churches
- Links to Github, Docker, HuggingFace
- Links to Github Profile, LinkedIn

Changes:

- None

Removals:

- Image gallery

### This is the first release of KJV_Search_Tools.

You can find the docker image for v0.1.0 here:


## Changelog

New Features:

- Leaflet.js map viewer
- Tiles dataset
- Image gallery

Changes:

Removals:
